div.p: This case-sensitive code system https://mitre.org/fhir/space-health/CodeSystem/space-monitoring-procedures-cs defines the following codes:

tr.td: The remote diagnosis and treatment of patients in space by means of telecommunications technology
Continuous or periodic monitoring of astronaut physiological parameters from a distance
The measurement and monitoring of biological parameters in the space environment
Systematic monitoring of astronaut health status during spaceflight
Medical consultation provided to astronauts from Earth-based physicians
Use of wearable devices to continuously monitor astronaut health parameters
Monitoring health parameters without invasive procedures
Medical care provided with limited or delayed input from Earth, necessitated by communication delays
Remote diagnostic procedures conducted on astronauts during spaceflight
Remote ultrasound examination guidance provided to astronauts from Earth-based physicians
Computer systems that assist in medical decision-making during spaceflight
Monitoring procedures performed by astronauts on themselves or crewmates

description.value: CodeSystem for space monitoring procedures not found in SNOMED CT

definition.value: The remote diagnosis and treatment of patients in space by means of telecommunications technology

Remote diagnostic procedures conducted on astronauts during spaceflight
